sides.title: Heavy Laser Cannon
sides.ability: Attack: After the Modify Attack Dice step, change all [Critical Hit] results to [Hit] results.

sides.title: Ion Cannon
sides.ability: Attack: If this attack hits, spend 1 [Hit] or [Critical Hit] result to cause the defender to suffer 1 [Hit] damage. All remaining [Hit]/[Critical Hit] results inflict ion tokens instead of damage.

sides.title: Jamming Beam
sides.ability: Attack: If this attack hits, all [Hit]/[Critical Hit] results inflict jam tokens instead of damage.

sides.title: Tractor Beam
sides.ability: Attack: If this attack hits, all [Hit]/[Critical Hit] results inflict tractor tokens instead of damage.
